price: 109 A Allah appartient tout ce qui se trouve dans les cieux et sur la terre. Et c’est à Allah que tout doit revenir.
arabic: وَلِلَّهِ مَا فِي ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَمَا فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِۚ وَإِلَى ٱللَّهِ تُرۡجَعُ ٱلۡأُمُورُ

version.title: French Translation - Rashid Maash
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Rashid Maash

meta.transliteration: walillahi mā fī al-samāwāti wamā fī al-arḍi wa-ilā al-lahi tur'jaʿu al-umūru
